subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: With a chance to break an N.H.L. record for the longest unbeaten streak to start the season at 11 games, Buffalo lost to the Atlanta Thrashers, 5-4, on Saturday night.
snippet: With a chance to break an N.H.L. record for the longest unbeaten streak to start the season at 11 games, Buffalo lost to the Atlanta Thrashers, 5-4, on Saturday night.
